action_prohibited: The configuration of the application prohibits this action
action_html: View this note like a article
action_slideshow: View this note like a slideshow
allow_popup_please: The new window has been blocked by your browser, please allow popups for your domain
button_curlBlog: Get the HTML of a page (from an URL)
button_save_done: The note has been successfully saved
button_save_error: There was an error while saving the note
button_upload_image: Upload an image and insert the tag where the cursor is located
copy_clipboard: Copy the note's content, with page layout, in the clipboard
copy_html: Copy the HTML of the note in the clipboard
copy_html_done: The HTML of the note has been placed in the clipboard
copy_link: Copy the link to this note in the clipboard
copy_clipboard_done: The note's content has been copied.  You can now paste the clipboard in your application.
copy_link_done: The URL $1 has been copied into the clipboard
datatable_copyKeys:
Press ctrl or ⌘ + C to copy the table data
to your system clipboard.

To cancel, click this message or press escape.
encrypted_hint: This information is encrypted. You'll be able to see it once you're connected
error_file_access_denied: Access denied - You are not allowed to access to this file
error_create_file: An error has occured during the creation of the note [$1]
error_create_folder: An error has occured during the creation of the folder [$1]
error_delete_file: An error has occured during the deletion of the file [$1]
error_delete_files: An error has occured during the deletion of the files
error_delete_folder: An error has occured during the deletion of the folder [$1] (this is the case when the folder contains readonly subfolders or notes)
error_lib_not_found: Error - The library [$1] was not found
error_rename_file: An error has occured when trying to rename the note [$1] into [$2]
error_rename_folder: An error has occured when trying to rename the folder [$1] into [$2]
favorites_added: The note had been added to yours favorites
favorites_addto: Add this note into yours favorites
favorites_removed: The note has been removed from the list of favorites
favorites_removefrom: Remove this note from yours favorites
fetch_specify_url: This option will retrieve the HTML source from a page publicly accessible on the internet, please specify the URL of the desired content
file_cant_delete: You can't delete the file [$1] since you don't have the right to see the parent folder
file_created: The note [$1] has been successfully created on the disk
file_deleted: The note [$1] has been successfully deleted
file_empty: Sorry, the note [$1] is empty; nothing to display
file_read_only: The note [$1] is read-only, it\'s then impossible to delete it
file_renamed: The note [$1] has been renamed into [$2]
folder_cant_delete: You can't delete the folder [$1] since you don't have the right to see that folder
folder_created: The folder [$1] has been created on the disk
folder_deleted: The folder [$1] and its content has been deleted
folder_not_deleted: The folder [$1] is outside your documentation root folder and therefore will not be deleted
folder_parent_not_accessible: Error - The parent folder of [$1] is not accessible to you
folder_read_only: Sorry but the folder [$1] is read-only
folder_renamed: The folder [$1] has been renamed into [$2]
hide_treeview: Hide the list with files, give more place to the content
htpasswd_added: The user [$1] has been added, he can now use the application
json_error: The [$1] task has returned an invalid JSON result
loading_tree: Loading the list of notes, please wait...
loaded_from_localStorage: Loaded from your browser's cache (reload this note)
not_authenticated: This feature is only accessible once connected, please use the login form first.
search_from_cache: Search results coming from the cache (reset the cache)
search_no_result: Sorry, the search is not successfull
settings_clean_done: The application's cache has been cleared
settings_erase: Remove previous exported files generated by marknotes like .epub, .docx, .html, .pdf, ... files
settings_erase_done: Previously exported files have been removed
settings_folder_folder: Folder that will contains yours notes
settings_interface_accent_conversion: Enable this only if you've problems with accentuated (due to a bug in PHP 7.0)characters in the treeview
settings_interface_can_see: Allow the user to access to the interface
settings_interface_logo: Logo to use, please note that the image should be saved in the %1 folder
settings_plugins_task_upload_enabled: Allow to upload files to the server
settings_plugins_buttons_clear_quickIcon: Add the clear cache button to the QuickIcons area
settings_plugins_buttons_login_quickIcon: Add the login button to the QuickIcons area
settings_plugins_buttons_filemanager_qui: Add the file manager button to the QuickIcons area
settings_plugins_buttons_update_quickIco: Add the update button to the QuickIcons area
settings_plugins_buttons_md_enabled: Show the export to markdown (.md) button
settings_plugins_buttons_md_quickIcons: Add the export to markdown (.md) button to the QuickIcons area
settings_plugins_buttons_docx_enabled: Show the export to Winword (.docx) button
settings_plugins_buttons_docx_quickIcons: Add the export to Winword (.docx) button to the QuickIcons area
settings_plugins_buttons_epub_quickIcons: Add the export to .epub button to the QuickIcons area
settings_plugins_buttons_odt_quickIcons: Add the export to .odt button to the QuickIcons area
settings_plugins_buttons_pdf_quickIcons: Add the export to .pdf button to the QuickIcons area
settings_plugins_buttons_txt_quickIcons: Add the export to .txt button to the QuickIcons area
settings_plugins_buttons_remark_quickIco: Add the Remark slideshow button to the QuickIcons area
settings_plugins_buttons_reveal_quickIco: Add the Reveal.Js slideshow button to the QuickIcons area
settings_plugins_task_update_enabled: Allow the allowed user to download and automatically install the latest version of marknotes
settings_plugins_buttons_editor_quickIco: Add the editor button to the QuickIcons area
settings_plugins_options_markdown_encryp: Password to use for the encryption
settings_plugins_buttons_quickicons_titl: Quick icons in the interface toolbar
settings_plugins_content_html_balloon_en: Add nicer tooltips (based on full css) in place of the standard 'title' attribute
settings_plugins_content_html_attributes: Allow to add extra attributes (classes, style, data-attributes, ...) to DOM elements
settings_plugins_content_html_bootstrap_: Add bootstrap features to the note once converted in HTML. The added features will be defined in the plugin's parameters
settings_plugins_content_html_encrypt_en: Add the lock span to show the user which parts of the note are connfidentials
settings_plugins_content_html_datatables: Just add a data-datatables-enable=1 to the HTML table tag when the plugin can be enabled for the rendered note. Should remains active as soon as the content datatable plugin has been enabled
settings_plugins_page_html_share_enabled: Add share buttons like facebook, twitter, mail, ...
settings_plugins_page_html_prism_enabled: Use prism.css to put source code in color
settings_plugins_content_html_font-aweso: Replace :fa-xxx: by the icon from font-awesome and, too, use a font-awesome bullet for lists
settings_plugins_content_html_jolitypo_e: automatically solve small issue with the note's typography
settings_plugins_content_html_image_gall: Add an image gallery to the site; load images in a div/span so the page html plugin can handle them
settings_plugins_content_html_format_ena: Format allows you to add your own custom prefix. In Markdown, you can type **bold** i.e. the double asterix will put what is inside in bold, the single asterix will put things in italic, ... Format will allow you to add your own prefix
settings_plugins_content_html_microdata_: Add span with itemprop attribute to words of the note
settings_plugins_content_html_toc_enable: Add a table-of-contents in the note
settings_plugins_content_html_security_e: Add extra security on the produced content like adding the rel=noopener attribute to links
settings_plugins_page_html_fakeLoader_en: Add a loading animation when the interface is displayed. This, only, when the site is visited by an human, not a bot
settings_plugins_page_html_add_icons_ena: Analyze each URLs in the note and add icons before when, f.i., the link points to github, youtube, facebook, ... or to a file (.docx, .ppt, ...)
settings_plugins_page_html_banner_enable: Add the marknotes ascii banner in html files
settings_plugins_page_html_clipboard_ena: Load clipboard.js to allow copy in clipboard features (used by the 'clipboard' plugin buttons of the content side)
settings_plugins_buttons_clipboard_enabl: Show the copy to the clipboard button
settings_plugins_buttons_clipboard_quick: Add the copy to the clipboard button to the QuickIcons area
settings_plugins_page_html_copyhtml_titl: Copy HTML source code to the clipborad
settings_plugins_page_html_copyhtml_enab: Load the .js file used by the copyhtml button; will allow to copy the HTML of the note into the clipboard
settings_plugins_page_html_definitions_e: Highlight words from the definition list
settings_plugins_page_html_docx_enabled: Load Googoose js files to allow to convert to Winword also when Pandoc isn't installed locally. This script is only needed for the interface
settings_plugins_options_page_html_ganal: Add the Google Analytics script also on localhost
settings_plugins_options_page_html_gtran: Add the Google translate script also on localhost
settings_plugins_buttons_copyhtml_enable: Show the copy HTML source code to the clipboard button
settings_plugins_buttons_copyhtml_quickI: Add the copy HTML source code to the clipboard button to the QuickIcons area
settings_plugins_page_html_linkify_enabl: Automatically add hyperlinks to content like URLs, email, ... not already with link
settings_plugins_page_html_links_target_: Force hyperlinks to be opened in a new tab
settings_plugins_buttons_quickicons: Show the %s button in the quickIcons area
settings_plugins_task_acls_enabled: Enable the ACLs task, allow to hide folders to unallowed users
settings_plugins_buttons_favorites_quick: Add the favorites button in the QuickIcons area
settings_plugins_task_fetch_enabled: Add the fetch button in the editor's interface
settings_plugins_task_translate_enabled: Add the translate button in the editor's interface
settings_plugins_task_index_enabled: Enable the dynamic index page feature
settings_plugins_buttons_timeline_quickI: Add the timeline button in the QuickIcons area
settings_plugins_buttons_sitemap_quickIc: Add the sitemap button to the QuickIcons area
settings_plugins_task_filemanager_enable: Enable the task, allow to use the file manager to authorized users. Be carefull by enabling this option since if enabled, the user can have a full access to directory where notes are stored (except for folders protected by ACLs)
settings_plugins_options_task_homepage: Relative filename to the note to display when the interface is started
settings_plugins_options_task_optimize_c: Duration of the cache in seconds (60*60*24 = one day = 86.400)
Duration of the cache in seconds for HTML pages (60*60*24*31 = one month = 2.678.400)
Duration of the cache in seconds for the sitemap (60*60*24*7 = one week = 604.800)
settings_regional_timezone: Timezone is used for correctly display date/hours
show_tree_not_allowed: Access to this screen has been disallowed, sorry
timeline: Display notes in a timeline view
tree_delete_folder: Remove the folder [$1] and everything in that folder
tree_delete_file_confirm: Are you really sure you want to delete the note [$1] ?
tree_delete_folder_confirm: Are your really sure you want to kill everything in the folder [$1] and the folder itself ?
tree_delete_cancelled: The action has been cancelled, nothing has been removed
unknown_error: An error has occured, please try again
update_newer: A newer version of Marknotes is available, click on this button to download and install that newer version
update_redirect: You'll be redirected to the installation script to contine the update process of marknotes
update_software: Update Marknotes, instal the latest version of the software
